directions: In a large saucepan bring vegetable broth to a boil over medium heat.  Stir in rice and continue to boil for about 8 minutes.  Stir in sorrel and return to a boil.  Remove from heat and puree in batches in a blender or food processor or using an immersion blender.
Return to medium-low heat and stir in cream, salt and pepper.  Heat through and serve.
title: Sorrel Soup
